name: A tâtons
description:
Hii, enjoy your game, friendly with french and english <3

This is the final project of second year at ETPA's school, the demand was to made an horor / Thriller game , idealy for streamers, who propose a 10 min experience of play.

We were a team of five, find us on the credits ;) the production head start in january to finish early in jun. The final result deserves to have some changes, so don't be surprised if you encounter some bugs or if you feeling lost ( we tried to do our best to avoid it e.e )

We love comments so don't forget to put a message <3 and thank you for playing
